title: How to Install the Blackberry App World on an Older Blackberry

steps.headline: Open your browser on your device.
Go to the Blackberry AppWorld website directly on your browser.
Wait for the app to install.

tyn: Older Blackberry device that doesn't have Blackberry AppWorld on it yet
text: Open your browser on your device.  Go to the Blackberry AppWorld website directly on your browser.  Tap the Download Now button.  Wait for the app to install.
sentences: Open your browser on your device.
Go to the Blackberry AppWorld website directly on your browser.
Wait for the app to install.
